description: Native Swift implementation of Flux.2 image generation models (Dev 32B, Klein 4B/9B) running locally on Apple Silicon using MLX. Supports Text-to-Image, Image-to-Image with multi-image conditioning, prompt upsampling, and LoRA adapters.
rules: Use Klein 4B model for fast generation (~26s) with 4 steps and guidance 1.0
Use Dev model for maximum quality with 28 steps and guidance 4.0 (requires 64GB+ RAM)
Always load models with Flux2Pipeline - it handles two-phase memory management automatically
For I2I generation, provide 1-3 reference images with strength 0.0-1.0
Use generateWithResult() to get both the image and the upsampled prompt
